label: Archive
label.archiveManager.name: Archive Manager
label.archiveManager.table.name: Name
dialog.message.confirm: Are you sure you want to archive this content?
dialog.message.published: This content is currently published and cannot be archived. Please unpublish this content manually before archiving.
dialog.message.alreadyArchived: This content has already been archived.
dialog.message.details: The content will be moved to the Archives folder and marked as read-only. Original location information will be preserved.
dialog.message.restore.confirm: Review the archive information and confirm the restore operation.
dialog.message.restore.selectLocation: Select the location where you want to restore this content.
dialog.message.restore.selectLocationInf: Click "Select Location" to open the content picker and choose a destination folder.
dialog.message.restore.details: The content will be moved to this location and the archived mixin will be removed.
dialog.message.restore.parentMissing: ⚠️ Original parent location no longer exists
dialog.message.restore.parentMissingInfo: The original parent path has been deleted or moved. Please select a new location for this content.
dialog.label.name: Name:
dialog.message.published.unpublish: Please unpublish this content in all languages before archiving.
notification.permission: You do not have permission to archive this content
notification.locked: Content is locked and cannot be archived
